name: UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType
desc: Constants that indicate the shape of the item’s collision bounds.

items.name: case ellipse
items.desc: Elliptical collision bounds. The shape of the ellipse is determined by the width and height of the item’s bounds property.

items.name: case path
items.desc: Path-based collision bounds. For this type, the shape is a UIBezierPath object stored in the item’s collisionBoundingPath property. See the description of that property for information about how to configure the path itself.
